name: arena-fund-mail-worker
description: Production-grade Gmail mailer Cloud Functions for Arena Fund

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy mailerQueueWorkerCreated --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=us-central1 --source=. --entry-point=onMailQueued --trigger-event-filters=type=google.cloud.firestore.document.v1.created --trigger-event-filters=database=(default) --trigger-event-filters-path-pattern=document=mailQueue/{docId} --service-account=arenafund@appspot.gserviceaccount.com --set-secrets=GMAIL_CLIENT_EMAIL=GMAIL_CLIENT_EMAIL:latest,GMAIL_PRIVATE_KEY=GMAIL_PRIVATE_KEY:latest --set-env-vars=GMAIL_IMPERSONATE=mani.swaminathan@myruvo.com,NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=dev && gcloud functions deploy mailerQueueWorkerUpdated --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --region=us-central1 --source=. --entry-point=onMailRequeued --trigger-event-filters=type=google.cloud.firestore.document.v1.updated --trigger-event-filters=database=(default) --trigger-event-filters-path-pattern=document=mailQueue/{docId} --service-account=arenafund@appspot.gserviceaccount.com --set-secrets=GMAIL_CLIENT_EMAIL=GMAIL_CLIENT_EMAIL:latest,GMAIL_PRIVATE_KEY=GMAIL_PRIVATE_KEY:latest --set-env-vars=GMAIL_IMPERSONATE=mani.swaminathan@myruvo.com,NEXT_PUBLIC_ENV=dev
